remarks: Lemma for ~ ftc1anc - construction of simple functions within an arbitrary absolute distance of the given function.  Similar to Lemma 565Ib of [Fremlin5] p. 218, but without Fremlin's additional step of converting the simple function into a continuous one, which is unnecessary to this lemma's use; also, two simple functions are used to allow for complex-valued ` F ` .  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 31-May-2018.)
